Sent: 2022-02-03 8:53:06 AM
Subject: PO# 45A140829, INV# SI014470, PS# 12695, CNTR# FANU3071278

Bonjour,

Veuillez notez que votre PO# 45A140829 a ete loader par le transitaire de Dura pour Patrick Morin.

Ci-joint une copie de votre facture, borderau d’expedition, une copie du Bill of lading et la facture du fret maritime.

Pour le telex release B/L je vous enverrai la copie lorsque c’est pret.

ETA Montreal fin Mars 2022

 

PATRICK MORIN est en charge du dedouanement

PATRICK MORIN est en charge de la livraison a porte.

 

 

DURA sera responsable du transport maritime jusqu’au port de Montreal.

DURA se chargera d’envoyer le manifest ou Arrival notice a P.M. et ALB pour le dedouanement de la merchandise. D’habitude je recois le manifest 5 jours avant l’arrivee du bateau.

DURA se chargera d’envoyer le pick up# a Lafrance pour ramasser votre conteneur au PORT DE MONTREAL / CN OU CP

 

J’espere avoir repondu a toutes vos questions.

N’hesitez pas a me contacter si vous voulez d’autres info.

Merci

Aline

Case number: 23830196

Hi Alexandra

In line with our tariff, if a location in North America has a lack of available truck power, delays may occur and any additional associated costs for such problems and delays will need to be borne by the cargo interests, like storage, demurrage and possible pre pull costs. Please also note that TRI-AXLE equipment chassis are extremely short and its availability is limited. Any additional charges due to missing availability of such equipment and also for missing truck power will be for account


Thank you and regards
Rogini Shummoogum

Subject: ARRIVAL NOTICE / TOI-213755 // TEMU2374601 + 1 8FAMRSMTR2201002

 

Dear all

Please find the attached Arrival Notice, Manifest, and HBL for HBL#  RSMTR2201002

Please provide the following to release your shipment:

1.            Payment (to the name of BNX SHIPPING INC)

2.            Signed GOC

3.            Trucking company name you will use to pick up your shipment

 

(Payment methods: E-transfer, Wire transfer, EFT, Cash deposit, Custom broker’s cheque copy, Certified cheque, Bank Draft or Money order.) For E-transfer (CAD only), please send payment to alice@bnxlogistics.com If you would like to do wire transfer, please reply/contact us for our bank information

Thank you

 

 

 

 

감사합니다, 좋은 하루 되세요 ~

*** Currently multiple steamship lines are not taking back empty containers at Vancouver. Port & other capacity for empty returns are 100% full.  Equipment circulation / import & export imbalances seems to be the issue. Current estimates are at 7 to 10 days wait on getting an empty return ticket. Accordingly, trucker yard storage fees to be expected for FCL shipments and port congestions fees to be expected for LCL shipments. Due to challenges of returning empty containers, creating an overall chassis shortage.

Because of extensive flooding on November 15th in Vancouver area, another delays will be anticipated on Vancouver port and CN/CP rail. They are trying to reopend the service, but extra charges can be applied on this congestion***

 

 

* Please be aware that your shipments are not insured unless you request in writing. In the event of cargo damage/loss, the liability of carrier (trucker, Airline, Steamship Line) is limited to terms and condition stated on the bill of lading. Therefore, in order to protect cargo against unforeseen events, BNX strongly recommends that you should purchase cargo insurance.

*서면으로 요청이 없을시 보험 부보가 되어 있지 않으며,  운송중 Damage or Loss 시,  각 운송 주체 (Trucker, Airline, Steamship line ) 들은 운송 주체가 발행하는 Document의 약관에 의거 제한된 금액만을 보상합니다. 따라서 보험을 가입하시어 사고 발생에 미리 대비하시기 바랍니다.

 

* All business transactions are governed by the Standard Trading Terms & Conditions established by the Canadian International Freight Forwarders Association (CIFFA). For a copy of CIFFA Standard Trading Conditions, please refer to:

https://ciffa.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/CIFFA-STCs-2021-English_Rebrand_1.pdf

 

Best Regards,

 

Khai Moon

Dear all

Please find the attached Arrival Notice, Manifest, and HBL for HBL#  RSMTR2201002

Please provide the following to release your shipment:

1.            Payment (to the name of BNX SHIPPING INC)

2.            Signed GOC

3.            Trucking company name you will use to pick up your shipment

 

(Payment methods: E-transfer, Wire transfer, EFT, Cash deposit, Custom broker’s cheque copy, Certified cheque, Bank Draft or Money order.) For E-transfer (CAD only), please send payment to alice@bnxlogistics.com If you would like to do wire transfer, please reply/contact us for our bank information

Thank you

*** Currently multiple steamship lines are not taking back empty containers at Vancouver. Port & other capacity for empty returns are 100% full.  Equipment circulation / import & export imbalances seems to be the issue. Current estimates are at 7 to 10 days wait on getting an empty return ticket. Accordingly, trucker yard storage fees to be expected for FCL shipments and port congestions fees to be expected for LCL shipments. Due to challenges of returning empty containers, creating an overall chassis shortage.

Because of extensive flooding on November 15th in Vancouver area, another delays will be anticipated on Vancouver port and CN/CP rail. They are trying to reopend the service, but extra charges can be applied on this congestion***

 

 

* Please be aware that your shipments are not insured unless you request in writing. In the event of cargo damage/loss, the liability of carrier (trucker, Airline, Steamship Line) is limited to terms and condition stated on the bill of lading. Therefore, in order to protect cargo against unforeseen events, BNX strongly recommends that you should purchase cargo insurance.

messages.subject_original: RE: HLBU 2626810
messages.body_original:
Good morning,

 

We are experiencing a huge shortage in drivers and on top are very delayed in/out of each terminal.

We are doing our best.

 

We have asked our driver to deliver direct today, hoping if all goes well to arrive around 14:00 today.

 

Thanks,

 

Clark Seymour

Dispatch/Intermodal

 

T: 800.461.8000 x2214

 

www.kriska.com

  

 

 

 

From: Raymond Jean-François <JFRaymond@inglasco.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 3, 2022 10:09 AM
To: Clark Seymour <cseymour@kriska.com>; Pepin Nancy <npepin@inglasco.com>
Cc: IntermodalCustomerService <intermodalcustomerservice@kriska.com>; Alexandra Joan Shand <dispatch@albcustoms.com>
Subject: RE: HLBU 2626810
Importance: High

 

Clark,

 

This is very urgent. It got to the port over a week ago and it looks to me like Hapag Lloyd just took care of trucking this morning (or yesterday).  Believe it or not, they asked why you did not get appointment…

 

We need quick delivery.

 

Thanks for your help.

 

 

 

Jean-François Raymond

ANALYSTE AUX ACHATS – PURCHASING ANALYST

T: 819 563-2205 EXT.3139

2745, RUE DE LA SHERWOOD,  SHERBROOKE (QUÉBEC)  J1K 1E1

 

De : Clark Seymour <cseymour@kriska.com>
Envoyé : February-03-22 9:36 AM
À : Pepin Nancy <npepin@inglasco.com>; Raymond Jean-François <JFRaymond@inglasco.com>
Cc : IntermodalCustomerService <intermodalcustomerservice@kriska.com>; Alexandra Joan Shand <dispatch@albcustoms.com>
Objet : RE: HLBU 2626810

 

Good morning,

 

Thank you Nancy we will advise once we have a driver planned and ETA.

 

Much appreciated,

 

Clark Seymour

Dispatch/Intermodal

 

T: 800.461.8000 x2214

 

www.kriska.com

  

 

From: Pepin Nancy <npepin@inglasco.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 3, 2022 9:30 AM
To: Clark Seymour <cseymour@kriska.com>; Raymond Jean-François <JFRaymond@inglasco.com>
Cc: IntermodalCustomerService <intermodalcustomerservice@kriska.com>; Alexandra Joan Shand <dispatch@albcustoms.com>
Subject: RE: HLBU 2626810

 

Hi

 

No appointment necessary.

 

You can deliver today until 3:30 pm or tomorrow between 7am to 11:30 am

 

NANCY PEPIN

COMMIS RÉCEPTION -EXPÉDITION - SHIPPING RECEIVING CLERK

T : 819-563-2205 Ext. 2154

F : 819-563-7634

 

2745, RUE DE LA SHERWOOD,  SHERBROOKE (QUÉBEC)  J1K 1E1

 

 

De : Clark Seymour <cseymour@kriska.com>
Envoyé : February-03-22 9:26 AM
À : Raymond Jean-François <JFRaymond@inglasco.com>
Cc : IntermodalCustomerService <intermodalcustomerservice@kriska.com>; Pepin Nancy <npepin@inglasco.com>; Alexandra Joan Shand <dispatch@albcustoms.com>
Objet : RE: HLBU 2626810

 

We can deliver up to 4pm this afternoon or plan for delivery Friday morning?

 

Thank you,

 

Clark Seymour

Dispatch/Intermodal

 

T: 800.461.8000 x2214

 

www.kriska.com

  

 

 

 

From: Raymond Jean-François <JFRaymond@inglasco.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 3, 2022 9:25 AM
To: Clark Seymour <cseymour@kriska.com>
Cc: IntermodalCustomerService <intermodalcustomerservice@kriska.com>; Pepin Nancy <npepin@inglasco.com>; Alexandra Joan Shand <dispatch@albcustoms.com>
Subject: RE: HLBU 2626810

 

Good morning,

 

Please schedule appointment with Nancy (cc).

 

Thank you.

 

 

Jean-François Raymond

ANALYSTE AUX ACHATS – PURCHASING ANALYST

T: 819 563-2205 EXT.3139

2745, RUE DE LA SHERWOOD,  SHERBROOKE (QUÉBEC)  J1K 1E1

 

De : Clark Seymour <cseymour@kriska.com>
Envoyé : February-03-22 8:46 AM
À : Raymond Jean-François <JFRaymond@inglasco.com>
Cc : IntermodalCustomerService <intermodalcustomerservice@kriska.com>
Objet : HLBU 2626810

 

Good morning Raymond,

We have the subject container available for pick up.

 

Would you be able to take delivery Thursday afternoon or Friday morning?

 

Thank you,

 

Clark Seymour

Dispatch/Intermodal

 

T: 800.461.8000 x2214

 

www.kriska.com

Dear Sean and Myriam,

 

Good afternoon!

 

This shipment checks in Canchi warehouse. Storage starts from Feb. 9.

 

But the customs clearance is missing.

 

Please kindly work on this and get it cleared customs to allow us to arrange the cargo delivery then after.

 

Also please confirm your delivery address: 3895 Auto Des Laurentides, Laval, QC, H7L 3H7. Thanks!

 

Best regards

 

 

Cathy Liu

PFF, CCS, CTCS

204- 280 Dorval Avenue, Dorval, Quebec  H9S 3H4

messages.subject_original: RE: ARRIVAL NOTICE / TOI-213755 // TEMU2374601 + 1 8FAMRSMTR2201002
messages.subject_stripped: ARRIVAL NOTICE / TOI-213755 // TEMU2374601 + 1 8FAMRSMTR2201002
messages.body_original:
div class="WordSection1">

HI

 

Thanks well received.

 

Please provide the following to release your shipment:

1.            Signed GOC

2.            Trucking company name you will use to pick up your shipment

 

감사합니다, 좋은 하루 되세요 ~

*** Currently multiple steamship lines are not taking back empty containers at Vancouver. Port & other capacity for empty returns are 100% full.  Equipment circulation / import & export imbalances seems to be the issue. Current estimates are at 7 to 10 days wait on getting an empty return ticket. Accordingly, trucker yard storage fees to be expected for FCL shipments and port congestions fees to be expected for LCL shipments. Due to challenges of returning empty containers, creating an overall chassis shortage.

Because of extensive flooding on November 15th in Vancouver area, another delays will be anticipated on Vancouver port and CN/CP rail. They are trying to reopend the service, but extra charges can be applied on this congestion***

 

 

* Please be aware that your shipments are not insured unless you request in writing. In the event of cargo damage/loss, the liability of carrier (trucker, Airline, Steamship Line) is limited to terms and condition stated on the bill of lading. Therefore, in order to protect cargo against unforeseen events, BNX strongly recommends that you should purchase cargo insurance.

*서면으로 요청이 없을시 보험 부보가 되어 있지 않으며,  운송중 Damage or Loss 시,  각 운송 주체 (Trucker, Airline, Steamship line ) 들은 운송 주체가 발행하는 Document의 약관에 의거 제한된 금액만을 보상합니다. 따라서 보험을 가입하시어 사고 발생에 미리 대비하시기 바랍니다.

 

* All business transactions are governed by the Standard Trading Terms & Conditions established by the Canadian International Freight Forwarders Association (CIFFA). For a copy of CIFFA Standard Trading Conditions, please refer to:

https://ciffa.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/CIFFA-STCs-2021-English_Rebrand_1.pdf

 

Best Regards,

 

Khai Moon

 

BNX SHIPPING INC.

6255 CANTAY ROAD, Unit#4

MISSISSAUGA, ON, L5R 3Z4, Canada

Tel: 905-501-9600 EXT 32 / Fax: 905-501-9800

Subject: ARRIVAL NOTICE / TOI-213755 // TEMU2374601 + 1 8FAMRSMTR2201002

 

Dear all

Please find the attached Arrival Notice, Manifest, and HBL for HBL#  RSMTR2201002

Please provide the following to release your shipment:

1.            Payment (to the name of BNX SHIPPING INC)

2.            Signed GOC

3.            Trucking company name you will use to pick up your shipment

 

(Payment methods: E-transfer, Wire transfer, EFT, Cash deposit, Custom broker’s cheque copy, Certified cheque, Bank Draft or Money order.) For E-transfer (CAD only), please send payment to alice@bnxlogistics.com If you would like to do wire transfer, please reply/contact us for our bank information

Thank you

 

 

 

 

감사합니다, 좋은 하루 되세요 ~

*** Currently multiple steamship lines are not taking back empty containers at Vancouver. Port & other capacity for empty returns are 100% full.  Equipment circulation / import & export imbalances seems to be the issue. Current estimates are at 7 to 10 days wait on getting an empty return ticket. Accordingly, trucker yard storage fees to be expected for FCL shipments and port congestions fees to be expected for LCL shipments. Due to challenges of returning empty containers, creating an overall chassis shortage.

Because of extensive flooding on November 15th in Vancouver area, another delays will be anticipated on Vancouver port and CN/CP rail. They are trying to reopend the service, but extra charges can be applied on this congestion***

 

 

* Please be aware that your shipments are not insured unless you request in writing. In the event of cargo damage/loss, the liability of carrier (trucker, Airline, Steamship Line) is limited to terms and condition stated on the bill of lading. Therefore, in order to protect cargo against unforeseen events, BNX strongly recommends that you should purchase cargo insurance.

*서면으로 요청이 없을시 보험 부보가 되어 있지 않으며,  운송중 Damage or Loss 시,  각 운송 주체 (Trucker, Airline, Steamship line ) 들은 운송 주체가 발행하는 Document의 약관에 의거 제한된 금액만을 보상합니다. 따라서 보험을 가입하시어 사고 발생에 미리 대비하시기 바랍니다.

 

* All business transactions are governed by the Standard Trading Terms & Conditions established by the Canadian International Freight Forwarders Association (CIFFA). For a copy of CIFFA Standard Trading Conditions, please refer to:

https://ciffa.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/CIFFA-STCs-2021-English_Rebrand_1.pdf

 

Best Regards,

 

Khai Moon

 

BNX SHIPPING INC.

MISSISSAUGA, ON, L5R 3Z4, Canada

Tel: 905-501-9600 EXT 32 / Fax: 905-501-9800
